comments: In JSFLibraryConfigModelAdapter.updateProjectDependencies at 67, a call is made to getSelectedJSFImplLibrary().  This method may return null point there is no check on this, which will cause an NPE at either line 71 or 73.

Sentence should read: "This method may return null, but there is no check on this, which will cause an NPE ... ".

Damien, could you provide steps to reproduce this bug?
An implementation library should be created and selected before wizard finishes project creation.  Hence, getSelectedJSFImplLibrary() should return something.  
While null needs to be handled, it would be helpful to know the steps to reproduce this bug, too.  Thanks,
The bug is no longer applicable due to change in implementation and could be closed.
Closing as part of mass query to clean up old resolved bugs in untargetted milestones.
